website_summaries.verdict: Practical floating candles by a popular brand that offers long, clean burn times and bulk quantities at reasonable price points.
pros: Top sellers that have earned the reputation for producing long burn times and praise for how well they float
cons: Some complaints of broken or misshapen candles upon arrival
Occasionally candles won't light, possibly due to wax coating on the wicks

customer_reviews.title: Amazing floating candles for our wedding
customer_reviews.text: We had a wedding on the beach and we knew we needed something that was long lasting. These floating candles were the perfect thing. I tested them at home before the wedding and one candle lasted almost 12 hours. They stayed lit all night long! And were cheaper than every other place we looked for floating candles. Follow @TastebudTravel_ on Instagram for more reviews & photos.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff & Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good for A Day or Evening
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderfully effective as centerpiece candles, or placed in glass vases filled with water and your favorite greens. They create a lovely, and personal, presence. Make sure you have enough for back-up, because they won't last beyond a long evening of burning, and you'll want to replace them if you plan to keep your decorations for any length of time. Floating candles can be used in tall cylinders or in short bowls, and the choice of what you use with them is endless. These are beautiful, white, clean-burning candles that add an elegance to whatever I put them with. I always keep a supply in the house for table centerpieces, and for entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: Galigraphics

customer_reviews.title: Some were melted and company responds!
customer_reviews.text: I give 4 stars because some showed up deformed and I didn’t have time to return or replace them because I needed the good ones for our wedding in a couple of days. UPDATE! Company contacted me and asked how many were deformed to issue a partial refund. Since I had pics they appreciated the detail. I give them 5 stars for being proactive in customer service! Accidents happen.
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, delivered fast and packaged well
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, delivered fast and packaged well. Will definitely order again if I ever have the need.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Marie

customer_reviews.title: These are beautiful candles and made a perfect birthday gift for my ...
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful candles and made a perfect birthday gift for my adult daughter. On the night of her birthday she floated several of them aflame in her pool. Many other things can be done with them
customer_reviews.author: GD

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: As far as i know, they all lit during my wedding. at the same time, i bought more than needed

customer_reviews.title: Dirty candles
customer_reviews.text: The candles were dirty. How did this pass quality inspection. Obvious one was done!!! Don’t waste your money

customer_reviews.title: Nice floating candles

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly - great value. Will order again!
customer_reviews.text: We used these for wedding centerpieces. The event was roughly 5hrs and they burned the entire time without problems and enough of the candle left to use another time. No complaints...it was exactly what I wanted!!!
customer_reviews.author: jessica h

customer_reviews.title: Candles came perfectly round and not melted at all even ...
customer_reviews.text: Candles came perfectly round and not melted at all even in the Texas heat on a mail truck. Tip: They were taken inside immediately from the door so I would not expect them to remain un-melted if they stayed out all day in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Perfect floating candles in our backyard pond
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as part of a backyard wedding. My mom has a waterfall/pond and we had these floating at the base. It was beautiful and it burned for at least 2 hours. Of few kept burning throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These candles are bomb! They lasted the entire party and longer. They burned for about 8 hours. I definitely recommend these floating candles to anyone that need some.

customer_reviews.title: Nice presentation
customer_reviews.text: Nice flowing candles. Not huge but good size Burn well

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for weddings
customer_reviews.text: Used for a wedding and they were perfect. All were delivered in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal guardiola

customer_reviews.title: They didn't "explode" like other cheap candles do when placed in water
customer_reviews.text: Quality candles! They didn't "explode" like other cheap candles do when placed in water. The wax evaporated as it should after being lit. I would totally buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Tran

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful treat to decorate tables!
customer_reviews.text: These candles floated at the top of vases filled with hydrangeas and were absolutely special at our wedding. The were on all the dining tables. They lasted well all evening.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: longer burning than expected !
customer_reviews.text: These are packed in a way that they are undamaged which is important to me and I've used eight of them so far and experienced even, consistent burning and they hold their shape well after four or five hours of being lit. Think total burn time slightly less than seven hours but find that to match my expectations. Think they are very nice and exactly what I was shopping for and at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: robin

customer_reviews.title: Great for Wedding Shower displays and Wedding displays
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for wedding shower. Did not put off a lot of smoke and lasted a long while. Can use again for other events. They were burning for about 3 hours and barely put a dent in the wax
customer_reviews.author: P.R.

customer_reviews.title: Served the purpose.
customer_reviews.text: Worked for the wedding needs. There were a few candles where the wick did not stay lit, but overall, this item worked well and fit my need.

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased for my daughter's wedding reception. They were already lit by the hotel staff when I arrived at 5 and they were still going strong at 11:30 when they were put out. When we were cleaning up I found 1 out of 48 candles was barely burned. Perhaps the hotel staff got the wick wet when they were put them in the vase.

customer_reviews.title: The candles were beautiful on our lake behind our house.

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE - These don’t stay lit.
customer_reviews.text: We had our event recently that I had purchased these for and what a disappointment!! Two-thirds of them went out and could not be re-lit. I was actually embarrassed because I was in charge of table decorations and only a third of the tables had candles that stayed lit the whole hour and a half of the event. I would definitely not recommend getting these candles!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Maeder

customer_reviews.title: Had these candles floating in pillars for a party and ...
customer_reviews.text: Had these candles floating in pillars for a party and they would not stay lit. There was no wind blowing them out, plus they were protected in the pillar vase. They drown themselves out. A couple stayed lit for the 3 hours needed but the rest could not be revived or re-lit after a short period of time.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT STAY LIGHT WHEN WATER TOUCHES THE WICK
customer_reviews.text: The candles are pretty but they don't stay lighted. Make sure the centerpieces are on sturdy tables because if not, the water goes into the wick and the fire goes out. Otherwise, they are nice.

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed but didn’t have time to send back

Aside from that, they were the perfect addition to top off my beautiful centerpiece.

product_meta.title: Royal Imports Floating disc Candles for Wedding, Birthday, Holiday & Home Decoration, 2 Inch, White Wax, Set of 12
product_meta.description:
Item Package Quantity:12| Size:2"

Illuminate your home or special event with these attractive unscented white floating disc candles by Royal Imports. These 2” disk shape candles are crafted with high quality white wax and cotton wick. The combination of these two elements will ultimately result in a clean and smokeless burn. The wax used in this floating candle is of the highest caliber and is made the USA. It is guaranteed not to drip or melt away fast. The average burn time is 4 hours which outperforms most mini floating candles. The extended burn time allows you to re-use this candle for multiple events thus adding value to your product. The special quality wax which is used in this candle is uniquely light-weight which helps the candle stay afloat. Place it in a bowl of water, swimming pool, or water-filled vase to create an attractive addition to any occasion including, wedding reception, garden, spa, bedroom, etc.

Royal Imports brings the highest quality candles and candle holders to the floral and event industry. Each 2 inch candle is crafted to perfection thus creating a sleek, flawless accent.



Popular with:

event planners
florists
interior designers
restaurants
home decorators

Overall Dimensions

Width: 2"
Height: 1"


Packaged 12 floating candles per pack.
feature_bullets: QUALITY & SAFETY: Each 2" floating candle is crafted of the highest quality wax to enhance its appearance and prevent it from dripping or melting away fast. All Royal Imports floating candles are MADE IN USA, and feature cotton core wicks which causes the candles to burn clean and smoke-free.

BEST SELLER: These beautiful disc candles are best sellers in the floral supply, home décor, and wedding planning industry. From home decorators, to event planners, a high quality traditional floating candle is always put to good use. It will enhance any event with its warm light and bring upon a sense of harmony and romance.

USES: These attractive floating disks are commonly used as: party favors, emergency light for power outages, aromatherapy, outdoor patio ambience, restaurant tables etc. Because of its extended burn-time, Royal Imports candles can be re-used numerous times.
BURN TIME – Provides approximately 4 Hours of warm ambient light
PACKAGING: Pack of 12 candles - carefully wrapped to prevent damage.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars82 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
